bibl.title: Chartae Latinae Antiquiores. Facsimile-Edition of the Latin Charters Prior to the Ninth Century. Part XLI. Egypt I. Published by Tiziano DORANDI.
bibl.note: Ch.L.A. XLI, 1186-1206. - 1186: Alessandria, Musée Gréco-Romain; - 1187-1206: Cairo, The Egyptian Museum [prima parte].
BRUCKNER Albert † and Robert MARICHAL, Chartae Latinae Antiquiores. Facsimile-Edition of the Latin Charters Prior to the Ninth Century. Part XLI. Egypt I. Published by Tiziano DORANDI.
Dietikon - Zürich, Urs Graf Verlag, 1994, in fol., viii-88 pp., ill. ISBN 3-85951-174-2.
